=== About Us ===
The Alaska Local Community Team's purpose is to advocate the use of Ubuntu and open source software in the state of Alaska.

=== Meetings ===
Meetings are held online, via IRC chat.  You can find us on the freenode network on IRC in the <nowiki>[[http://java.freenode.net//index.php?channel=ubuntu-us-ak|Alaska Channel]]</nowiki>. See our <nowiki>[[Meetings | Meetings]]</nowiki> page for more information!

=== Approval Application ===
Alaska is not an approved LoCo (yet!).  See <nowiki>[[ApprovalApp|this page]]</nowiki> for our approval application!
